column3: No member of our family was ever an outlaw.

column3: When Donovan was released쉼표 he was badly undernourished.

column3: I can illustrate my method of establishing law in science very easily.

column3: My Irish teacher showed excessive irritability about my questions on religion.
column4: 아일랜드 인인 우리 선생님은 내가 종교에 대해서 물으면 극도로 짜증스러운 반응을 보였다. V.S. 프리쳇 『성자』
column5: My Irish teacher showed _ irritability about my questions on religion.

column3: When my roommates were the culprits쉼표 I was not backward with my revenge.

column3: As a juvenile쉼표 I learned to write to help me to survive.

column3: I wouldn따옴표t take the bait from Sylvester쉼표 and I turned away.

column3: For those Americans like myself who insist on improving the quality of education쉼표 there is good news.
